level.text: The Director shall review applications and make awards based upon the following criteria:
Soundness of research design, statistical technique, and procedures and methodology, if appropriate; and
Theoretical and technical soundness of the proposed plan of operation including consideration of the extent to which:
The objectives of the proposed project are clearly defined and clearly stated;
Proposed project activities appear likely to reach objectives;
The proposed project would contribute to the achievement of the grant’s stated policy objectives; and
Provisions are made for adequate evaluation of the effectiveness of the project and for determining the extent to which the objectives are accomplished.
